process.name: Package Cabbage as Preserved Food
process.description: Cut and freeze dry cabbage into package food.

process.name: Package leaves as Preserved Food
process.description: Cut and freeze dry leaves into package food.

process.name: Package Carrot as Preserved Food
process.description: Cut and freeze dry carrots into package food.

process.name: Package Swiss Chard as Preserved Food
process.description: Cut and freeze dry swiss chard into package food.

process.name: Package Potatoes as Preserved Food
process.description: Cut and dry potatoes into package food.

process.name: Package Quinoa into Granola Bar
process.description: Package puffed Quinoa, honey, nuts and dried fruits into Granola Bar.

process.name: Package Rice into Granola Bar
process.description: Package puffed rice, honey, nuts and dried fruits into Granola Bar.

process.name: Package Wheat into Granola Bar
process.description: Package puffed wheat, honey, nuts and dried fruits into Granola Bar.

process.name: Package Quinoa into Granola Bar
process.description: Package puffed Quinoa, sugarcane juice, nuts and dried fruits into Granola Bar.

process.name: Package Rice into Granola Bar
process.description: Package puffed rice, sugarcane juice, nuts and dried fruits into Granola Bar.

process.name: Package Wheat into Granola Bar
process.description: Package puffed wheat, sugarcane juice, nuts and dried fruits into Granola Bar.

process.name: Package Okara and Wheat into Granola Bar
process.description: Package puffed wheat, sugarcane juice, nuts and dried fruits into Granola Bar.

process.name: Package Okara and Rice into Granola Bar
process.description: Package puffed wheat, sugarcane juice, nuts and dried fruits into Granola Bar.

process.name: Package Okara and Quinoa into Granola Bar
process.description: Package puffed wheat, sugarcane juice, nuts and dried fruits into Granola Bar.

process.name: Make French Fries from potatoes
process.description: Cut potatoes and make French Fries.

process.name: Make French Fries from potatoes
process.description: Cut potatoes and make French Fries.

process.name: Make Soy Sprouts from Soybeans
process.description: Sanitize soybean seeds with sodium hypochlorite. Wash the seeds and soak them in water and wait for germination. When germinated, freeze dry them.

process.name: Make Quinoa Sprouts from Quinoa
process.description: Rinse the quinoa seeds in a bowl. Wash the quinoa seeds to remove the soapy coating known as saponin. Soak in water and drain the water after 30 minutes. Repeat the rinsing and draining process every 8 hours. Put the tray of quinoa in a dark room. Place the cloth back over the quinoa for protection.The quinoa will sprout into a plate full of spiral-shaped roots that are at least one-quarter inch in length. Dry out sprouts for up to 12 hours after fully germinated.

process.name: Make Okara and Soymilk from Soybeans
process.description: Make pulp (Okara) and Soymilk from Soybean after Washing, Dehulling, Soaking, Milling, Paste Heating, and Filtration.

process.name: Make sesame milk from soymilk
process.description: Make sesame milk from soymilk

process.name: Press and Refine Peanut Oil from Peanuts
process.description: Derive vegetable oil from peanuts. Press and refine it for use

process.name: Chop and Roast Peanuts in Oven
process.description: Chopped up peanuts and roast them in oven

process.name: Make Peanut Butter from Peanuts
process.description: Ground peanuts, mix with oil, pour the mixture into food processor. Blend until smooth.

process.name: Make Peanut Butter from Peanuts
process.description: Ground peanuts, mix with oil, pour the mixture into food processor. Blend until smooth.

process.name: Package Roast Peanuts into Dry Food
process.description: Pack peanuts into dry food

process.name: Bake White Bread from Soy Flour
process.description: Make 2 loaves of White Bread from Soy Flour

process.name: Make Tofu from Soymilk and Epsom Salt
process.description: Boil up Soymilk, add Epsom Salt as Coagulant, gently stir and heat, and the curds will separate.

process.name: Make Tofu from Soymilk and Vinegar
process.description: Boil up Soymilk, add Epsom Salt as Coagulant, gently stir and heat, and the curds will separate.

process.name: Make Tofu from Soybeans, Water, and Epsom Salt (large batch)
process.description: Boil up Soybeans, grind into soymilk, filter off okra, and add Epsom Salt as Coagulants. gently stir and heat, the curds will separate.

process.name: Make Tofu from Soybeans, Water, and Vinegar (large batch)
process.description: Boil up Soybeans, grind into soymilk, filter off okra, and add vinegar as Coagulants. gently stir and heat, the curds will separate.

process.name: Make Soymilk and Tofu from Soybeans, Water, and Epsom Salt
process.description: Boil up Soybeans, grind into soymilk, filter off okra, and add Epsom Salt as Coagulants. gently stir and heat, the curds will separate. Save and sweeten some soymilk.

process.name: Make Soymilk and Tofu from Soybeans, Water, and Vinegar
process.description: Boil up Soybeans, grind into soymilk, filter off okra, and add vinegar as coagulants. gently stir and heat, the curds will separate. Save and sweeten some soymilk.

process.name: Process Soybean into Soy Flour
process.description: Create defatted soy flour by cracking, screening, heating soybean at 130 deg C with hot extrusion and high pressure .

process.name: Make Tempeh from Soybeans
process.description: Boil Soybeans, add vinegar and Rhizopus oligosporus starter, and allow to ferment.

process.name: Make Black Oncom from Okara
process.description: Moisten Okara with vinegar, add Rhizopus oligosporus starter, and allow to ferment.

process.name: Make Tempeh from half Soybeans and half Okara
process.description: Boil Soybeans, add vinegar, Rhizopus oligosporus starter, and okara, and allow to ferment.

process.name: Make Tofu and Tempeh from Soybeans and Vinegar (large batch)
process.description: Boil Soybeans, blend, separate okara and ferment with Rhizopus oligosporus starter. Add vinegar to soymilk as coagulant. This uses all the okara by-product of tofu.

process.name: Make Tofu and Tempeh from Soybeans and Epsom Salt (large batch)
process.description: Boil Soybeans, blend, separate okara and ferment with Rhizopus oligosporus starter. Add vinegar to soymilk as coagulant. This uses all the okara by-product of tofu.

process.name: Make Tofu, Soymilk, and Tempeh from Soybeans and Vinegar
process.description: Boil Soybeans, blend, separate okara and ferment with Rhizopus oligosporus starter. Add vinegar to some soymilk as coagulant, sweetening the remainder.

process.name: Make Tofu, Soymilk, and Tempeh from Soybeans and Epsom Salt
process.description: Boil Soybeans, blend, separate okara and ferment with Rhizopus oligosporus starter. Add vinegar to some soymilk as coagulant, sweetening the remainder.

process.name: Process White Rice into Rice Flour
process.description: Rince rice, dry, and finely grind.

process.name: Process Rice into White Rice and rice bran oil
process.description: Remove hulls, bran layers and germ from rice. May enrich milled rice with vitamins and minerals

process.name: Process Rice into Brown Rice
process.description: Remove only hulls from rice. The light brown color is due to the presence of the bran layers and the embryo or germ. Brown rice requires longer cooking time than either parboiled or regular-milled white rice

process.name: Process Brown Rice into Rice Flour
process.description: Rinse rice, dry, and finely grind

process.name: Process Brown Rice into White Rice
process.description: Remove bran layers and germ from rice. May enrich milled rice with vitamins and minerals

process.name: Process Wheat into Wheat Flour
process.description: Rinse wheat, dry, and finely grind

process.name: Extract Soy Protein from Soy Flour
process.description: Create Defatted Soy Proteins from Soy Flour by Alkaline extraction, Centrifugation, Acid Precipitation of Proteins, Centrifugation, Washing, Spry Drying and Isolation of Proteins

process.name: Expel Soybean Oil from Soybean
process.description: Cracking, Screening, Heating at 130 deg C, Hot extrusion, Pressure at 40-60 MPa. Screening and Decantation of Oil

process.name: Press Sesame Oil from Sesame Seeds
process.description: Continuous pressing by means of expellers is a widely applied process for the extraction of oil from sesame seeds

process.name: Press Garlic Oil from Garlic
process.description: Continuous pressing by means of expellers is a widely applied process for the extraction of oil from Garlic

process.name: Make Veggie Patty from Veg, Tofu and Spice
process.description: A Veggie patty imitates a burger patty and is made of textured vegetable protein (like soy), legumes (beans), tofu, nuts, mushrooms, or grains or seeds, like wheat and flax.

process.name: Make Veggie Patty from Veg, Tempeh and Spice
process.description: A Veggie patty imitates a burger patty and is made of textured vegetable protein (like soy), legumes (beans), tempeh, nuts, mushrooms, or grains or seeds, like wheat and flax.

process.name: Make Veggie Patty from Veg, Okara and Spice
process.description: A Veggie patty imitates a burger patty and is made of textured vegetable protein (like soy), legumes (beans), okara, nuts, mushrooms, or grains or seeds, like wheat and flax.

process.name: Make Veggie Patty from Quinoa Tempeh and Spice
process.description: A Veggie patty imitates a burger patty and is made of fermented quinoa seasoned with vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, onion, syrup, and pepper.

process.name: Bake Wheat Bun from Wheat Flour
process.description: Bake Wheat Burger Bun from Wheat Flour

process.name: Bake Wheat Bread from Wheat Flour
process.description: Bake Wheat Bread from Wheat Flour

process.name: Make Wheat Noodles from Wheat Flour
process.description: Mix flour with water and knead to form dough. Heat paste into flat sheet. cut sheet into different thickness.

process.name: Make Rice Noodles from Rice Flour
process.description: Mix flour with water and knead to form dough. Heat paste into flat sheet. cut sheet into different thickness.

process.name: Make Rice Vinegar by Fermentation
process.description: Clean bottle with bleach. Add water to white rice and heat up mixture. Add bacteria and wait for fermentation to complete

process.name: Make Mustard
process.description: Soak seeds, crush and ground. Hulls and bran are sifted out. Liquids added to the seed flour.

process.name: Make Ketchup from Tomatoes
process.description: Cook tomatoes. Then grind them with garlic, onions, vinegar, and spice.

process.name: Make Soy Sauce by Fermentation
process.description: Soybeans are first soaked in water for an extended period, and then steamed at high temperatures. Carbohydrates contained in wheat gives soy sauce its fine aroma and adds sweetness to the soy sauce. Wheat is roasted at high temperatures, then crushed by rollers to facilitate fermentation.

process.name: Make Miso by Fermentation
process.description: Clean bottle with bleach. Soybeans are soaked and fermented with rice and brine to produce a thick paste.

process.name: Derive Sugar, Cane fiber, Bagasse, Sugarcane Juice from Sugarcane
process.description: Derive Sugar from Sugarcane. The juice is obtained by crushing peeled sugarcane in a mill or by hand cranked machine.

process.name: Produce Fiber Cloth from Cane and Soy Fiber
process.description: Fiber cloth Weaving

process.name: Extract Minerals from Soybean Ash
process.description: Extract minerals from Soybean Ash.

process.name: Make Blueberry Muffin
process.description: Mix flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, honey, and blueberry and bake in preheated oven at 200 deg C.

process.name: Make Okara Blueberry Muffin
process.description: Mix flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, honey, and blueberry and bake in preheated oven at 200 deg C.

process.name: Make Blueberry Muffin
process.description: Mix flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, sugarcane juice, and blueberry and bake in preheated oven at 200 deg C.

process.name: Make Okara Blueberry Muffin
process.description: Mix flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, sugarcane juice, and blueberry and bake in preheated oven at 200 deg C.

process.name: Make Cranberry Juice from Cranberry
process.description: The juice is obtained by crushing cranberries in a mill or by hand cranked machine.

process.name: Make Cranberry Sauce from Cranberry
process.description: Add sugar, salt, ginger to cranberries and cook in the pan over low heat, stirring occasionally for 10 mins, until the sugar dissolves and the cranberries are soft. Increase the heat to medium and cook until the cranberries burst in a few minutes. Reduce the heat to low and stir in the reserved cranberries.

process.name: Make Immune Booster
process.description: Make Immune Booster with minerals and fiber

process.name: Make Pizza Dough
process.description: Make round pizza dough from three types of flours

process.name: Process fish oil from fish meat
process.description: Derive fish oil from fish meats. Press and refine it for use

process.name: Make fish patty from fish meat
process.description: A fish patty is made of textured fish meat and other ingredients.
